summary: Implements a high‑level pipeline that orchestrates a variational auto‑encoder, CLIP text encoder, tokenizer, conditional UNet, diffusion scheduler, and safety checker to convert textual prompts into images, with optional semantic editing capabilities.
business_intent: Provide developers and content creators with an easy‑to‑use, end‑to‑end solution for generating AI‑driven visual assets from text, supporting safe and semantically guided image synthesis for marketing, design, entertainment, and other creative applications.
